summary: A gorgeous character that looks like a \"younger\" Pamela Anderson. I not a fan of of Pamela Anderson but when I saw my
descriptionHtml:
I hope you enjoy this, your endorsements are always appreciated, thank you! :)

Update:
Added new screenies per request with slider maxed out--yeah, I see what you mean she really does look more like Pamela Anderson. ;)


Update:
I\'ll be making an update file without cheat items--it\'s my fault, I added some items for my tester and mistakenly released that version.  I\'ll still release this cheated edition but as an option file. My apologies. :)


If you want your character to look as close to the one you see in the screenshots use your favorite face texture from the list below.  I never use just one but interchange the texture files from these three till I get the look I like.  So I encourage you to do the same OR just use any one of the three below because they\'re all good.  If you aren\'t comfortable interchanging files around then JUST USE ONE face texture mod. A friend who tested this savegame mod for me uses only \"Better Females by Bella\" and his Pamela Anderson looked great!



I hope to use this female character and my male character, Stoker Wolff in a companion mod when the CK is released. 


Install:
Drop .ess file into your Skyrim savegame directory as follows:  Documents>My Games>Skyrim>Saves

Uninstall
Remove .ess file from your Skyrim savegame directory as follows: Documents>My Games>Skyrim>Saves


Face:
Coverwomen by mrLenski
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563
[I use tintmasks and eyevrows from this mod]

Better Females by Bella by BellaGail
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
I use Bella #3 -- femalehead.dds file
[I do not use the tintmasks or eyebrows from this mod]

Beauty Faces for females by necKros
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1329


Hair:
Coolsims Hair Pack by newermind43
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809


Eyes:
Natural Eyes by nevenbridge
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3589


Players have been asking for links to the armor that Pam wears and here are a few links to the stuff she wears the most. Enjoy! :)

theRoadstrokers Alvin Hews Annika Outfit by theRoadstroker
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5662

CBBE Daedric Female by Laxi2610
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6316

Fiona Armor for CBBE - NKT by Nikitaa
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6412

Ebony Lace and Nightingale Lace by DizzasterJuice
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1572

Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set -Work In Progress- by Killer Keo
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654
author: sunsi
